Class PhantomController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.neumont.csc150.Character.PhantomController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class PhantomController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
    controls everything that happens in the game screen

      • checkbounce

        public boolean checkbounce()
        Checks the boundries of the canvas and sees if the main object collides with sides or objects around them. If they touch an object in the game this makes the object slow down.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean.

      • slow

        public void slow()
        slows down the speed of the main object

      • pickup

        public void pickup()
        Finds out the position and sees if an image/object is in the position. Makes said object in position null and adds the money up by calling sell.addMoney();
